channel.title: ~Ideas For Us To Try~
channel.description:
Hi guys this is posted for people to submit ideas which over people may read and ry out and everntually we might have a sucessfull way to help on runescape/neopets( i dont play neo pets but it may help people)
Lay Out Like Below
Game:Runescape/Neopets
Idea: TYPE YOUR IDEA HERE PLEASE
ps:this is created to help people share and help others in runescape or neopets please post ideas like i said and this is for all ideas dont be shy because u may think people will laugh at you but they may also praise u if it works NO SPAMMING NO FLAMMING NO SCAMMING [br][size=1]Posted at: October 14, 2006, 05:56:59 PM[/size][hr]Game:Runescape
Idea:With Standard Buttons BackWards And Forwards If We Hit With A Weapon And Click Backwards And Forwards Constanlty It May Cause The Server To Multiply The Hit For Example Its A 22 Once Clicking Backwards And Forwards It Goes To 22,22 And If We Clicked So Fast It Could Hit 22,22,22,22,22,22,22 in a number of seconds and if it cant be done that way maybe we could find a way around it[br][size=1]Posted at: October 14, 2006, 06:04:31 PM[/size][hr]Guys Please Try Keep This Post Alive As It May Be Extreamly UseFull In Future And Even If Its A Stupid Idea It May Be HelpFull

item.title: ~Ideas For Us To Try~

item.description:

[quote]Guys Please Try Keep This Post Alive As It May Be Extreamly UseFull In Future And Even If Its A Stupid Idea It May Be HelpFull

item.title: ~Ideas For Us To Try~
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Idea:With Standard Buttons BackWards And Forwards If We Hit With A Weapon And Click Backwards And Forwards Constanlty It May Cause The Server To Multiply The Hit For Example Its A 22 Once Clicking Backwards And Forwards It Goes To 22,22 And If We Clicked So Fast It Could Hit 22,22,22,22,22,22,22 in a number of seconds and if it cant be done that way maybe we could find a way around it

never heard of client and serverside differences?

Read full topic
